scripts.2: npm start && npm run polyfills && cat dist/shim.js dist/polyfills.js | uglifyjs -e -m sort,eval -c drop_console,dead_code,drop_debugger,unsafe,comparisons,conditionals,booleans,loops,unused,if_return,warnings > dist/polyfills.min.js
scripts.ee: rm -rf node_modules && npm i && npm link global && npm run otvet
scripts.otvet: npm run polyfills && npm run ug:otvet && npm run cp:otvet && npm run cp:otvet2
scripts.ug:otvet: cat dist/shim.js dist/sham.js dist/shiv.js dist/ie8.js dist/polyfills.js ../otvet.mail.ru/vendors/jquery-1.11.1.js ../otvet.mail.ru/vendors/lodash.2.4.0.js ../otvet.mail.ru/vendors/backbone.1.1.0.js ../otvet.mail.ru/vendors/portal-menu.0.3.3.js ../otvet.mail.ru/vendors/mrg-context.js | uglifyjs -e -m sort,eval -c drop_console,dead_code,drop_debugger,unsafe,comparisons,conditionals,booleans,loops,unused,if_return,warnings > dist/polyfills.min.js
scripts.newotvet: npm start && npm run polyfills && cat dist/shim.js dist/sham.js dist/shiv.js dist/ie8.js dist/polyfills.js | uglifyjs -e -m sort,eval -c drop_console,dead_code,drop_debugger,unsafe,comparisons,conditionals,booleans,loops,unused,if_return,warnings > /Users/ikuznecov/projects/new.otvet.mail.ru/dev/polyfills.min.js
scripts.touch: npm run polyfills && npm run ug:touch && npm run cp:touch
scripts.get:all: npm run get:shim & npm run get:sham & npm run get:shiv
scripts.qcms2: browserify polyfills.js dom.js dom4.js | uglifyjs -cm | gzip > ../qcms/frontend/build/polyfills.min.js.gz
scripts.up: npm start && npm run polyfills && npm run ug
scripts.ss: npm start && npm run polyfills && npm run ug && npm run cp
scripts.ug2: cat dist/shim.js dist/sham.js dist/shiv.js dist/ie8.js dist/polyfills.js > dist/polyfills.min.js
scripts.ug: cat dist/shim.js dist/sham.js dist/shiv.js dist/ie8.js dist/polyfills.js | uglifyjs -cm | tee dist/polyfills.min.js | gzip > dist/polyfills.min.js.gz
scripts.polyfills:touch: npm run polyfills:touch:local & npm run polyfills:touch:virtualko
scripts.polyfills:touch:virtualko: cat dist/shim.js dist/sham.js dist/shiv.js polyfills.js dom.js dom4.js | uglifyjs -cm > /Users/ikuznecov/projects/otvet.mail.ru/virtualko/newapi/app/js/polyfills.min.js
scripts.polyfills:touch:prod: cat dist/shim.js dist/sham.js dist/shiv.js polyfills.js dom.js dom4.js | uglifyjs -cm | tee ../touch.otvet.mail.ru/app/js/polyfills.min.js | gzip > ../touch.otvet.mail.ru/app/js/polyfills.min.js.gz
